column1: #Text=The optics of a 'surplus' (virtual, rather than real) favours the Harper government.

#Text=It also en traps the other parties in the debate of 'deficit or surplus' in a non-meaningful way since anything less than $10 billion one way or another say the legitimate economists can be easily manufactured by 'cooking the books.'
#Text=The actual concern on the day after October 19th is what the true fiscal situation has been inherited by the winner.
